Professional medication reviews and guidance in the comfort of your own home

            How I Can Help
Hi, I‚Äôm Madeline, a licensed pharmacist dedicated to helping you understand and safely manage your medications. I provide personalized, in-home consultations to review your prescriptions, organize your medication routine, and ensure you‚Äôre getting the most from your treatments.
Many people, especially seniors, struggle with complex medication regimens. That‚Äôs where I come in ‚Äì bringing professional pharmacy expertise directly to your home.

title: Welcome to Madeline‚Äôs Doorstep Rx Care
text:
How I Can Help


Comprehensive Medication Review
Complete evaluation of all prescriptions, supplements, and over-the-counter medications. I‚Äôll identify potential interactions and safely dispose of expired medications.


Personalized Medication Schedule
Create easy-to-follow daily schedules with timing recommendations for optimal effectiveness. I can also help set up pill organizers.


One-on-One Education
I explain what each medication does in plain language, discuss side effects to watch for, and answer all your questions.


Ongoing Support
Follow-up visits as medications change, coordination with your doctors, and written summaries for you and your family.

title: Welcome to Madeline‚Äôs Doorstep Rx Care
text:
Who Benefits from My Services?

    
         Seniors
        Managing multiple medications can be overwhelming. I help simplify your routine.
    
    
         Family Caregivers
        Get professional guidance to help care for your loved ones safely.
    
    
         Post-Hospital Patients
        Transitioning home with new medications? I'll help you understand your new regimen.
    
    
         Anyone Confused
        If you're unsure about your medications, I'm here to provide clarity.

section: Ready to Take Control of Your Medications?
text:
Ready to Take Control of Your Medications?
I serve the Indianapolis area and surrounding communities. Home visits typically last 1-2 hours, allowing plenty of time to address all your medication concerns.
